org.neontoolkit.registry.api
Class Oyster2Manager

java.lang.Object
  org.neontoolkit.registry.api.Oyster2Manager

public class Oyster2Manager
extends java.lang.Object

The class Oyster2Manager provides the initial connection to Oyster2 registry. It allows to configure the peer behaviour and provides the means to display results

Version:
2.2, September 2008
Author:
Raul Palma

public static void setAutomaticSyncrhonization(boolean t)
Specify if automatic syncrhonization is on/off

Parameters:
t - true=on;false=off default=true;

setSuperOyster

public static void setSuperOyster(java.lang.String t)
Set the IP address of the superOyster node where information will be stored

Parameters:
t - the ip of the oyster node default=null; null=local;

setPushChangesToOysterIP

public static void setPushChangesToOysterIP(java.lang.String t)
Set the IP address of the Oyster node where changes will be pushed

Parameters:
t - the ip of the oyster node default=null; null=nopush;

setQueryTimeOut

public static void setQueryTimeOut(int t)
Set the timeOut for queries.

Parameters:
t - time in miliseconds default=120000 (2 minutes)

setSimplePeer

public static void setSimplePeer(boolean simplePeer)
Specify if the local peer will start the discovery process that runs periodically. This method is particulary useful when oyster will start and stop quickly (i.e. web service invocation, plugin, etc.). DEFAULT=false

Parameters:
simplePeer - specifies if Oyster2 should be simple

setCachingPeer

public static void setCachingPeer(boolean caching)
Specify if the local peer will cache locally information of remote objects i.e. save locally remote objects. Note: This property has effect only if the peer is not set as a simple peer. DEFAULT=false

Parameters:
caching - specifies if Oyster2 should cache information

setWorkflowSupport

public static void setWorkflowSupport(boolean workflowSupport)
Specify if workflow support is enabled. DEFAULT=false

Parameters:
workflowSupport - specify if peer supports workflow.

setLogEnabled

public static void setLogEnabled(boolean logEnabled)
Specify if debug should be started i.e. log messages will be displayed on the screen. DEFAULT=false

Parameters:
logEnabled - specify if consolo will display debug information

newConnection

public static Oyster2Connection newConnection(boolean startKAON2Server)
Creates a new connection to Oyster2 registry. Initializes the registry factory and its preference store with the default properties file. It should be specified if Oyster2 starts an instance of KAON2 platform or not.

Parameters:
startKAON2Server - specifies if Oyster2 should start KAON2 server or not.
Returns:
A connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

newConnection

public static Oyster2Connection newConnection(boolean startKAON2Server,
                                              java.lang.String preferencesFilename)
Creates a new semi customized connection to Oyster2 registry. Initializes the registry factory and its preference store with the properties file located at the path passed by the parameters. It should be specified if Oyster2 starts an instance of KAON2 platform or not.

Parameters:
startKAON2Server - specifies if Oyster2 should start KAON2 server or not.
preferencesFilename - the path to the properties file.
Returns:
A connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

newConnection

public static Oyster2Connection newConnection(java.lang.String preferencesFilename,
                                              java.lang.String kaon2Filename,
                                              java.lang.String serverRootFolder,
                                              java.lang.String javaStartParameters)
Creates a new customized connection to Oyster2 registry. Initializes the registry factory and its preference store with the properties file located at the path passed by the parameters. Starts an instance of KAON2 platform with the given parameters.

Parameters:
preferencesFilename - the path to the properties file.
kaon2Filename - the path to the kaon2.jar file.
serverRootFolder - the path to KAON2 server root folder. (i.e. -ontologies parameter)
javaStartParameters - the parameters to start the java jar. (e.g. -ms256M -mx256M)
Returns:
a connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

getConnection

public static Oyster2Connection getConnection()
Retrieves a connection to Oyster2 registry. It is assumed that the registry factory and its preference store has been initialized. It also assumes an instance of KAON2 platform is running.

Returns:
A connection object to the Oyster2 registry.

closeConnection

public static void closeConnection()
Closes the connection to Oyster2 registry. Destroys Kaon2 instance if started withing Oyster.

OMV2RDF

public static void OMV2RDF(OMVOntology OMVOnto,
                           java.lang.String filename)
Generates an RDF File from an OMVOntology object

Parameters:
OMVOnto - is a OMVOntology object that we want to convert to a RDF file.
filename - is the name of the file that will be generated.
